text: Hello ! How it's going ? Sorry I've been gone for a while haha, been busy months with pre-production with a film ! So far we are we doing quite good,our team already started with post-production.  I've started doing Flour FX and it's getting there :slightly_smiling_face: I thought maybe you would like to see the edit of the film and stuff what I am doing right now. I would be really nice to get some feedback about my work in progress :slightly_smiling_face: <https://vimeo.com/395690323> pw : fusspot, this is our actuall edit. All the compositing stuff is really early so far.  And this is my work in progress <https://vimeo.com/395290642> pw : flour :slightly_smiling_face:
